body.name: Bought by the Rhan: A Bonded Brides of Rhan Sci-Fi Novella (The Bonded Brides of Rhan Book 1)
body.description: She. Is. Mine.No frail human can match him...KallanMy father has ordered me to breed a human female. Not that I expect a human to be strong enough to withstand the might of a Rhanian coupling.So I buy myself a human.But something’s not right.She makes every atom in my scaled body sing out. The fates have spoken.I don’t just want to mate this female.I want to bond her.No alien clan lord can claim her...BelleI didn’t plan on washing up on a backwater planet shared with an alien race. But I’ve made the best of it, setting up my own bakery and making a life here.Until one of those aliens walks into my shop and literally carries me away.But something’s not right.I’m kidnapped and alone with a giant snake-man.I should be scared, but I’m not. Far from it.I want to tame this alien beast.The books in the Brides of Rhan series can all be read as stand-alones, each with a different couple. But they’re all connected, and intended for steamy readers! The books all feature bonding, instalove, and baby-logues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Burnt Cake and Lizard Eggs
reviews.reviewText: I thought Belle and her big alien were cute. Insta-love, fated mates are one of my favorite types of tropes. Belle was so independent and it was so sweet of him to compromise so she was happy. The funniest part was when Candice told Belle that the Rhan were lizard like and layed eggs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Short sweet cute
reviews.reviewText: I love when human mates are strong and instalove works in our favor. She's stubborn and perfect for his control freak nature. I do recommend it for a very fast read. I think it took me 20 minutes lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You CAN have your cake and eat it, too
reviews.reviewText: When Kallan Et Dargo is told to find a mate, he thinks he can buy himself a human woman and wham, bam, thank you ma'am his way to help solve the problem of his people's declining population. But tossing Belle Adams over his shoulder and kidnapping her doesn't work in the no-strings fashion he expected. Belle is a blonde, but not the least bit dumb, and Kallan finds his self-assured world turned upside down by the feisty and independent bakery owner. Their attraction to each other is instantaneous but saying their cultural differences are significant is an understatement. However, where there's a will there's a way, and after several miscues, the lovers manage to negotiate their way to a compromise and their unexpected mate-bond gives them a permanent happily ever after.I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Funny Translation Leads to Love
reviews.reviewText: The Rhan needs a bride, so he uses his understanding of the language and buys one. Belle has opened her bakery - Blondies - and never thought a Rhanian would view it as a marketplace for a bride. So let the miscommunication began. This story captured my attention and kept it all the way. So much to work out between two different species but love will find a way. I liked the way the two are drawn together and how they each learn about the other. I recommend this read.I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I loved this book. It was such a fun, quick read. Kallan's father ordered him to take a mate. Their species, the Rhan, are not producing heirs, so they'll have to choose from other species, and he's been told to find a human bride. He finds a store- Blondies- picks one up, pays and leaves. Belle was working in her bakery with a friend when an alien comes in and takes her away. I loved the misunderstanding here- it made me laugh. He thought he was going into a store selling blonde women, and was surprised to learn it is a cake. The attraction between them is immediate, even though Belle had never imagined an alien would walk through her doors, and Kallan thought humans too small and weak. A fun and good start to a new series. 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well-written alien romance novella
reviews.reviewText: This story was very well-written and entertaining. I wanted to dislike Kallan for his prejudices but he very quickly learns that he’s an idiot so it ends up being funny. Belle really puts him in his place. She is so strong in the face of what should be a scary situation. I loved the way their relationship unfolded and how Kallan learned to be less arrogant because of Belle.I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is such an enjoyable and quick read. I love this couple and the story had me hooked throughout.I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kallan and Belle
reviews.reviewText: Belle (h) works hard at her new life on planet Eliopan operating her small bakery in the human sector of the planet. Kallan (H), a Rhan diplomat overseeing his people’s mining operations, is tasked by his father to take a human mate and decides to find a human to buy. He mistakes the bakery as a place to buy a human and carries Belle off to his home. Things heat up quickly between the two and he realizes that she’s more than just a breeding partner. But there are cultural differences the two must overcome if they are to have a future together. Sweet alien-human romantic quickie with a side of heat and humor.
